title: Can Hypebeast Magic Revive J. Crew?
description: J. Crew was an essential style source until it wasn’t. Back from bankruptcy, the brand has bet on the Supreme honcho Brendon Babenzien to bring streetwear wizardry to the mainstream.
dc:creator: Guy Trebay
media:credit: Mark Sommerfeld for The New York Times
media:description: J. Crew is betting on Brendon Babenzien, here at the clothier’s new store on the Bowery, to deploy his experience at Supreme to drive its revival.
